mapper.select: SELECT M.*, U.prefer_part, U.prefer_gender, U.prefer_style, U.prefer_goal, U.user_readme, U.buy_list FROM Member M JOIN User U ON M.member_code = U.member_code WHERE M.member_code=#{member_code};
SELECT t.* FROM Trainer t JOIN BuyList b ON t.member_code = b.trainer_member_code WHERE b.user_member_code = #{userMemberCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (member_code, prefer_part, prefer_gender, prefer_style, prefer_goal, user_readme) VALUES ((SELECT member_code FROM Member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}), #{prefer_part}, #{prefer_gender}, #{prefer_style}, #{prefer_goal}, #{user_readme});
